scripts.docker:sync: docker cp hardhat-node:/app/src/utils/abis.js src/utils/abis.js && docker cp hardhat-node:/app/src/constants/config.js src/constants/config.js && echo Synced generated files from container!
scripts.hardhat:compile: docker compose exec hardhat npx hardhat compile
scripts.hardhat:deploy: docker compose exec hardhat npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost && npm run docker:sync
scripts.hardhat:deploy:testnet: docker compose exec hardhat npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-testnet.js --network bscTestnet
scripts.hardhat:clean: docker compose exec hardhat npx hardhat clean
scripts.hardhat:console: docker compose exec hardhat npx hardhat console --network localhost
scripts.hardhat:time:advance: docker compose exec hardhat npx hardhat run scripts/advance-time.js --network localhost
scripts.hardhat:time:1min: docker compose exec hardhat node scripts/advance-time.js 60 --network localhost
scripts.hardhat:time:1hour: docker compose exec hardhat node scripts/advance-time.js 3600 --network localhost
scripts.hardhat:time:1day: docker compose exec hardhat node scripts/advance-time.js 86400 --network localhost
scripts.dev:all: npm run docker:up && npm run dev
scripts.dev:setup: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up && node scripts/sleep.js 5 && npm run hardhat:compile && npm run hardhat:deploy
